solution_line_template: Hannah's total earnings are {hours_worked_per_week} hours * ${hourly_rate}/hour = $<<{hours_worked_per_week}*{hourly_rate}={total_earnings_before_dock}>>{total_earnings_before_dock} a week.

Her pay was docked because she was late {times_late} times, so {times_late} times * ${dock_per_late} per time = $<<{times_late}*{dock_per_late}={total_docked_amount}>>{total_docked_amount} were docked.
She gets paid ${total_earnings_before_dock} - ${total_docked_amount} = $<<{total_earnings_before_dock}-{total_docked_amount}={final_pay}>>{final_pay} at the end of the week.
